name: BoidWatch
description:
Soar alongside these majestic cones, or modify them to act as you see fit. You can create and destroy members of a complex simulation, or just enjoy the magic of flight.

Wand - Direct the flock to travel wherever you command.
Boid Spawner - Use the sliders to customize the different behavioral parameters of each Boid.
Gun - Introduce Boids to a fiery and explosive demise.
Mind Control - attach yourself to a member of the flock, and command it to swoop by pointing where you want them to go and pulling the trigger.
